about_the_game:
An invitation to a wedding awaits you, yet the question remains: Are you prepared for the unfolding drama? Well, put on your best clothes and play the game to find out!


There are five romanceable characters, all of them gender-customizable for you to choose from. Each one of their routes will be different, adding lots of replayability to the game.


Get ready for romance, laughs, and wild choices in 'The Wedding,' a Visual Novel where your choices matter. Fake date, elope, or sabotage a wedding – your decisions will shape the story.

This isn't your usual love story – it's for readers who love a good twist. In this game, you can take revenge on a bully, rekindle with an ex, fake date your business partner, neighbor, or the cute firefighter who is also your friend with benefits. And if you're up for it, you can even run away with the bride or groom if you can make them fall in love with you.


Choose Your Identity:

Customize your character's gender, name, and pronouns.
Shape your story by making decisions that resonate with your identity

Meaningful Choices:

Navigate a branching narrative with decisions that impact the story.
Experience different dialogue responses based on your choices.

Inclusive Representation:

Embrace gender diversity with customizable options for all romance options.
Engage in romances that reflect a range of identities.

Personalized Intimacy:

Customize the character's body parts in intimate scenes.
Experience steamy moments that cater to your preferences.

Replayability:

Enjoy multiple playthroughs with distinct character routes.
Uncover new experiences and endings each time you dive in.

content_descriptors.notes: There are tasteful nudity in this game and text of depiction of sexual intercourse between consenting adults.
